eu_initiatives:
The IFD's European Committee reflects the profession's (Denturists) voice on EU Directives related and relative to its professional members as Oral Health Carers. 
These Directives are mainly the Medical Devices Directive, Free movement of Professionals and their establisment of Services, together with the Professional Qualification Directive.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
relevant_communication: Our European Committe,can advice, propose, recommend and participate in any consultatioal program, as experts in thier field of dental services, whenever the European Commission reviews any of the Directives related to our profession as providers and manufacturers.
